title: Dolefull nevves from Ireland sent in a letter by a gentleman to a brother-in-law here in London, wherein he relates the distressed condition the English are in, in that kingdome. With the copie of a commission granted by Luke Birne a prime commander of Ireland, whose grandfather was M. Feagh Hugh an arch traytor in Q. Elizabeth's raigne, to execute marshall law npon [sic] all the Protestants.
author: P. S.
